106 #define LED_DEVICE(dev_name, active_level, pio_port0, pio_pin0, pio_port1, pio_pin1, pio_port2, pio_pin2, pio_port3, pio_pin3) { \
107  .name = dev_name, \
108  DEVICE_MODE(0666, 0, 0, S_IFCHR), \
109  DEVICE_DRIVER(led), \
110  .cfg.periph.port = 0, \
111  .cfg.pin_assign = active_level, \
112  .cfg.pcfg.pio[0].port = pio_port0, \
113  .cfg.pcfg.pio[0].pin = pio_pin0, \

149 typedef struct MCU_PACK {
150  char version[8] ;
151  char sys_version[8] ;
152  char arch[8] ;
153  u32 signature ;
154  u32 security ;
155  u32 cpu_freq ;
156  u32 sys_mem_size ;
157  char stdout_name[LINK_NAME_MAX] ;
158  char stdin_name[LINK_NAME_MAX] ;
159  char name[LINK_NAME_MAX] ;
160  sn_t serial ;
161  u32 flags ;
162 } sys_attr_t;

341 #define SDSPI_DEVICE(device_name, port_number, pin_assign_value, cs_port_value, cs_pin_value, bitrate_value, cfg_ptr, state_ptr, mode_value, uid_value, gid_value) { \
342  .name = device_name, \
343  DEVICE_MODE(mode_value, uid_value, gid_value, S_IFBLK), \
344  DEVICE_DRIVER(sdspi), \
345  .cfg.periph.port = port_number, \
346  .cfg.pin_assign = pin_assign_value, \
347  .cfg.pcfg.spi.mode = SPI_ATTR_MODE0, \
348  .cfg.pcfg.spi.cs.port = cs_port_value, \
349  .cfg.pcfg.spi.cs.pin = cs_pin_value, \
350  .cfg.pcfg.spi.width = 8, \
351  .cfg.pcfg.spi.format = SPI_ATTR_FORMAT_SPI, \
352  .cfg.bitrate = bitrate_value, \
353  .cfg.state = state_ptr, \
354  .cfg.dcfg = cfg_ptr \
355 }
